name: tonybanters/zdump
description: Quick and Painless Dump Extension for PHP

post-install-cmd:
@php -r "if (!extension_loaded('zdump')) { echo '
 zdump extension not loaded. Please compile and install:
'; echo '  cd vendor/tonybanters/zdump && phpize && ./configure && make && sudo make install
'; echo '  Then add extension=zdump.so to your php.ini

'; }"
